name: Apocalypse Now?
description:
You accidentally promised an apocalypse and became a cult leader. Now the date is fast approaching, and you need to plan your escape from your adoring followers, who are going to be really disappointed, and are totally nuts.

Run from your Followers and don't let them catch you!  run from your personal Apocalypse for you have denied everyone else's.
